title: Generative AI-Enhanced Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum
context.additional_context: A course for in-service elementary teachers exploring the educational potential of generative AI, utilizing LMS-based video lectures, discussion boards, and assignment submission features.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more fundamental principles of generative AI and its applications in education.
Learners can streamline idea generation and content production by 20% or more when designing elementary mathematics lessons using AI tools.
Learners can recognize copyright and data security issues arising from generative AI use and propose mitigation strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
